scripts.prep:mainnet: mustache templates/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen;
scripts.prep:goerli: mustache templates/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen;
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prep:mainnet; graph deploy --studio ko-mainnet
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run prep:goerli; graph deploy --studio ko-goerli
